import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-root', templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app.component.css'] }) export class AppComponent { title = 'tienda'; toogletab(): void { if (document.getElementById("nav-wrapper")) { if ((document.getElementById("nav-wrapper")).style.display == "block") { (document.getElementById("nav-wrapper")).style.display = "none"; } else { (document.getElementById("nav-wrapper")).style.display = "block"; } } } }
